## Describe the Bug

A concise description of what went wrong.

## To Reproduce

Steps to reproduce locally or via CI.

## Expected Behavior

What should have happened instead?

## Evidence

- [ ] Link to failing GitHub Action or artifact

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Reproducible test added
